title: expose all versions for sources hosted on github
body:
### Expected Result

_spack create_ exposes all versions hosted on github

### Actual Result

Only versions found on first page are exposed and presented to the user

### Steps to reproduce the issue

Borgbackup is used in the example below, but any repository with enough releases to span more than a single page will behave the same way.

```console
$ spack create https://github.com/borgbackup/borg/archive/1.1.2.tar.gz
==> This looks like a URL for borg
==> Found 10 versions of borg:

  1.2.0dev0  https://github.com/borgbackup/borg/archive/1.2.0dev0.tar.gz
  1.1.2      https://github.com/borgbackup/borg/archive/1.1.2.tar.gz
  1.1.1      https://github.com/borgbackup/borg/releases/download/1.1.1/borgbackup-1.1.1.tar.gz
  1.1.0rc4   https://github.com/borgbackup/borg/archive/1.1.0rc4.tar.gz
  1.1.0rc3   https://github.com/borgbackup/borg/archive/1.1.0rc3.tar.gz
  1.1.0rc2   https://github.com/borgbackup/borg/releases/download/1.1.0rc2/borgbackup-1.1.0rc2.tar.gz
  1.1.0rc1   https://github.com/borgbackup/borg/archive/1.1.0rc1.tar.gz
  1.1.0      https://github.com/borgbackup/borg/archive/1.1.0.tar.gz
  1.0.11rc1  https://github.com/borgbackup/borg/releases/download/1.0.11rc1/borgbackup-1.0.11rc1.tar.gz
  1.0.11     https://github.com/borgbackup/borg/releases/download/1.0.11/borgbackup-1.0.11.tar.gz

==> How many would you like to checksum? (default is 1, q to abort)
```

### Information on your system

- Debian 9.2 running spack release 0.10.0.
- Debian 9.2 running HEAD (c7d2b4dbd670c170b27e4742de4f6c30f7edba93)
